bug.short_desc: Sample is not working because of missing Remote ressource

long_desc.thetext:
Hello, I am having a message :"Async(1) exception: Transport error 301: Moved permanently"
Can you fix the bug and make this ressource availiable again ?
Thank you.
Regards.

Sorry for the long wait!
The "example/RpcTree 1" sample in the demo browser - as mentioned in the sample description - depends on a working RPC backend, which we do not provide on our demo server for security reasons. So this sample is only useful for code browsing, or if deployed locally together with a suitable backend (e.g. like one provided in the 'backend' package of qooxdoo, backend/php/services/qooxdoo/fs.php).
This sample is due to re-consideration for the demo browser, and might be moved to a dedicated "not for online use" section.
